text: (to moosa) gusse mein bhare pachhatae hue apanee qaum kee taraph palate aur aakar kahane lage ai meree (qambakht) qaum kya tumase tumhaare paravaradigaar ne ek achchha vaayada (tauret dene ka) na kiya tha tumhaare vaayade mein arasa lag gaya ya tumane ye chaaha ki tum par tumhaare paravaradigaar ka gazab toont pade ki tumane mere vaayade (khuda kee parasatish) ke khilaaph kiya
